rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETP1100, ETW1000, ETW2111} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BUS2020, ETC2480%, ETF2480%}

description: Topics include business modelling with spreadsheets; the methodology of business modelling; linear programming; transportation and assignment problems; network models and project scheduling problems.
